|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = RRK-WPCN04 |icid = 4833A-WPCN04 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Ralink;RT2760; |chip2 = Ralink;RT2720; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
